title: How does Amazon plan to save its employees' jobs from robots? - Quora

response.answer_text: Amazon is struggling very hard to be able to hire enough people to manage strategies. By automating daily mundane tasks, they free up the resources that are least available, a.k.a. humans. This resource is what they want to utilize to make good strategies and take big decisions, instead of wasting time in doing things that can be automated.
